title: Runaway
lyrics:
Lyric Hiro - Runaway

[Romanization]

eojilleojin kkeuten
Lost inside your mind
tteoreojil geot gateun
Darkest side your around
I'm a sick and tired
You always makes me heartbreak all night
jomyeongui geurimja
I can't hide to your around

Don't stop and keep runaway
nan neoui gin eodume
Oh geueulligo inne

Oh stop and stare on the way
nan dorikin eodume
Oh geuneuljigo inne

You called me love
But used me at all
When I gave you warm,
You gave me your cold

The wrong kind of place
Have same things again
It's time to get away

All about your breathe
I'm all denial, freak
And all of fake in your kiss
Escaping all that
Dazed and confused by your trick

You're just a narcissist
And all of fake in your real
Erasing all that
Dazed and confused by your trick

kkeojil deuthan neoui
Losing all your light
baraejideon neoneun
Naked all your lies
You just using me
When always hurt and when I'm goes down
sarajin geurimja
Be drown all of your night

Don't stop and keep runaway
nan neoui gin eodume
Oh geueulligo inne

Oh stop and stare on the way
nan dorikin eodume
Oh geuneuljigo inne

You're just a narcissist

Oh stop and stare on the way

Keep runaway

Keep runaway

I keep runaway

Umm
I keep runaway

Don't stop and keep runaway
